info.name: Scholarport Booking & Blog API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Scholarport's Booking System and Blog/Educational Content features.

## Setup Instructions
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Set the `base_url` variable to your server URL
3. **Get JWT Token first** using your admin credentials
4. Start with creating a counselor (Admin) before testing bookings
5. Start with creating a category before testing blog posts

## Authentication
Use JWT Bearer token for admin endpoints:
1. Call 'Login (Get JWT Token)' with your admin credentials
2. Token is auto-saved to collection variable
3. Admin endpoints will use this token automatically

item.name: üîê AUTHENTICATION

request.description:
Login with admin credentials to get JWT access and refresh tokens.

**Steps:**
1. Replace 'admin' with your username
2. Replace 'your_password' with your password
3. Send the request
4. Tokens are automatically saved to collection variables

**Response:**
- `access`: Short-lived access token (use in Bearer header)
- `refresh`: Long-lived refresh token (use to get new access token)

Use the refresh token to get a new access token when the current one expires.

**Note:** The refresh token is automatically used from collection variables.

Test that your authentication is working by calling an admin endpoint.

**Expected:** If authenticated, returns list of bookings. If not, returns 401 Unauthorized.

item.description:
## Authentication

This API uses JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication for admin endpoints.

### How to Authenticate:
1. **Login** - Send username/password to get tokens
2. **Use Access Token** - Include in Authorization header as `Bearer <token>`
3. **Refresh** - When access token expires, use refresh token to get a new one

### Token Lifetimes:
- Access Token: 1 day
- Refresh Token: 7 days

### Which endpoints need auth?
- All `/admin/` endpoints require authentication
- Public endpoints (list counselors, create booking, etc.) do not require auth

item.name: üìÖ BOOKING SYSTEM

request.description: Get a list of all active counselors available for booking sessions.
Get detailed information about a specific counselor including their specializations and availability.

query.description: Number of days to look ahead (default: 7, max: 30)

request.description: Get available booking slots for a counselor for the next N days. Returns dates with available time slots.

body.raw:
{
    "counselor_id": {{counselor_id}},
    "student_name": "John Doe",
    "student_email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "student_phone": "+1234567890",
    "scheduled_date": "2025-12-05",
    "scheduled_time": "10:00:00",
    "session_type": "initial",
    "meeting_notes": "I'm interested in universities in the USA and Canada. Budget around $50,000/year."
}

request.description:
Create a new booking session with a counselor.

**Session Types:**
- `video` - Video call session
- `audio` - Audio call session
- `in_person` - In-person meeting

**Note:** After creating, the student will receive a verification email. Use the verification token to confirm the booking.
Verify a booking using the token sent to the student's email. This confirms the booking and changes status to 'confirmed'.
Get details of a specific booking using its booking_id (UUID).
Cancel an existing booking. Optionally provide a cancellation reason.
Reschedule an existing booking to a new date and time. Use PATCH method for partial updates.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled, no_show

request.description: Admin endpoint to list all bookings with filtering options.

Admin endpoint to update booking status and add notes.

**Status Options:**
- `pending` - Awaiting verification
- `confirmed` - Verified and confirmed
- `completed` - Session completed
- `cancelled` - Cancelled by student or admin
- `no_show` - Student didn't attend
Get booking statistics including total bookings, status breakdown, and popular counselors.

item.description:
## Booking System API

Allows students to book counseling sessions with available counselors.

### Workflow:
1. **Browse Counselors** - List available counselors
2. **Check Availability** - Get available time slots
3. **Create Booking** - Submit booking request
4. **Verify Email** - Confirm booking via email token
5. **Attend Session** - Join at scheduled time

### No Authentication Required
Bookings use email verification instead of user accounts.

item.name: üìù BLOG SYSTEM

request.description: Get all blog categories with post counts.
Create a new blog category. Slug is auto-generated from name.
Get details of a specific category.
Update an existing category.
Delete a category. Will fail if category has posts.
Get all tags with usage counts.
Create a new tag. Slug is auto-generated from name.
Get details of a specific tag.

List all published blog posts with pagination and filtering.

**Filter Options:**
- `category` - Filter by category slug
- `tag` - Filter by tag slug
- `search` - Search in title and content
- `featured` - Only featured posts (true/false)
- `ordering` - Sort results

body.raw:
{ "title": "Top 10 Universities in USA for Computer Science in 2025", "excerpt": "Discover the best universities in the United States for pursuing a degree in Computer Science, including admission requirements and scholarship opportunities.", "content": "

Introduction

The United States remains one of the top destinations for international students pursuing Computer Science degrees. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the top 10 universities that offer exceptional CS programs.

\n\n

1. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)

MIT consistently ranks as the #1 university for Computer Science worldwide. With cutting-edge research facilities and world-renowned faculty, MIT offers unparalleled opportunities for CS students.

\n\n

2. Stanford University

Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, Stanford provides unique access to tech giants and startup ecosystems. Their CS program emphasizes both theoretical foundations and practical applications.

\n\n

3. Carnegie Mellon University

CMU's School of Computer Science is one of the oldest and most respected in the world. They offer specialized tracks in AI, robotics, and human-computer interaction.

\n\n

Admission Requirements

Most top universities require:

  • Strong GPA (3.5+)
  • GRE scores (optional at some schools post-COVID)
  • TOEFL/IELTS for international students
  • Letters of recommendation
  • Statement of purpose
\n\n

Scholarship Opportunities

Many universities offer merit-based scholarships and teaching/research assistantships that can significantly reduce the cost of attendance.

", "category": {{category_id}}, "tags": ["USA Universities", "Computer Science", "Graduate Studies"], "status": "published", "is_featured": true, "meta_title": "Top 10 USA Universities for Computer Science 2025 | Scholarport", "meta_description": "Complete guide to the best Computer Science programs in the United States for 2025, including MIT, Stanford, and CMU." }

request.description:
Create a new blog post.

**Status Options:**
- `draft` - Not visible to public
- `published` - Visible to everyone
- `archived` - Hidden but not deleted

**Tags:** Can be existing tag names or new ones (will be created automatically)
Get full details of a blog post by slug. Automatically increments view count.

body.raw:
{ "title": "Top 10 Universities in USA for Computer Science in 2025 (Updated)", "excerpt": "Updated guide to the best CS universities in America.", "content": "

Introduction

Updated content here...

", "tags": ["USA Universities", "Computer Science", "Graduate Studies", "2025 Rankings"], "is_featured": true }

request.description: Update an existing blog post. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.
Soft delete a blog post. The post is archived, not permanently deleted.
Get all approved comments for a blog post, including nested replies.
Add a comment to a blog post as a guest. Comments require moderation before appearing.
Reply to an existing comment. Set the `parent` field to the comment ID you're replying to.

Approve or reject a comment.

**Status Options:**
- `pending` - Awaiting moderation
- `approved` - Visible on the post
- `rejected` - Hidden from public
List all uploaded images in the media library.

formdata.description: Select an image file (jpg, png, gif, webp)

formdata.value: Aerial view of MIT campus in Cambridge, Massachusetts
MIT's iconic campus along the Charles River

request.description:
Upload an image to the media library (stored in Cloudinary).

**Supported Formats:** JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP
**Max Size:** Depends on Cloudinary plan (10MB for free tier)
Get details of a specific image.
Delete an image from the media library.
Subscribe to the blog newsletter to receive updates about new posts.
Unsubscribe from the blog newsletter.
Get blog statistics including total posts, views, comments, and top performing content.

item.description:
## Blog/Educational Content System

Full CRUD operations for managing educational blog content.

### Features:
- **Categories** - Organize posts by topic
- **Tags** - Flexible tagging system
- **Posts** - Rich content with SEO fields
- **Comments** - Community engagement with moderation
- **Media Library** - Image uploads via Cloudinary
- **Newsletter** - Email subscriptions

### Content Workflow:
1. Create categories for organization
2. Create posts (draft or published)
3. Upload images for posts
4. Moderate comments
5. Track analytics

Open Swagger UI documentation in browser.
Get OpenAPI 3.0 schema in YAML format.
